Ludum Dare: Day 1 - It Begins

August 20, 2011

The hours leading up to the announcement of the Dare’s theme, which marks its start, were painful to say the least. I ran through all the possible themes trying to come up with ideas, chatting with the kind folks in the official IRC channel. I tried to pass the time until 10PM EST but man, I just couldn’t wait.

The time did finally come though, and the theme was voted “Escape”, narrowly passing my second-favorite... read more

August 18, 2011

Whenever I’m learning a new programming concept or language, my mind inevitably goes to, “How could I use that in a game?” I’d like to be naive and think that that will always be how I’ll learn.
